body_html:
@caisq Thanks for your positive comment. Above, I have already provided the test case for this issue.

$ flake8 . --count --select=E901,E999,F821,F822,F823 --show-source --statistics

The issues behind all 9 of my PRs to date were found using this same flake8 test. I would be happy to work with you to get this test (esp. F821) implemented across the TensorFlow codebase as there are currently 24 undefined names in Python 2 and 33 undefined names in Python 3.

Pylint does not currently find undefined names.

body:
@caisq Thanks for your positive comment.  Above, I have already provided the test case for this issue.

$ __flake8 . --count --select=E901,E999,F821,F822,F823 --show-source --statistics__

The issues behind all [9 of my PRs](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pulls/cclauss) to date were found using this same [flake8](http://flake8.pycqa.org) test.  I would be happy to work with you to get this test (esp. F821) implemented across the TensorFlow codebase as there are currently __24 undefined names in Python 2 and 33 undefined names in Python 3__.

[Pylint](https://github.com/PyCQA) does not currently find undefined names.
